pr_title: chore(expression-language): improve variable resolving for expression evaluation

timeline.message:
chore(expression-language): pass variables as context

* pass a context for evaluating an expression instead of all variables to only read the required variables
* replace Jackson MessagePack object mapper by manual transformation using Zeebe's MessagePack reader/writer to reduce overhead

timeline.bodyText: Do we need a new logger here? Also it is not used.
timeline.author: deepthidevaki

replies.bodyText:
The logger is used in FeelToMessagePackTransformer.scala and MessagePackValueMapper.scala.
Currently, we create a class like this if we need a logger in a new module. We could also think about having all loggers defined in the util module.
replies.author: saig0

timeline.message:
chore(expression-language): pass variables as context

* pass a context for evaluating an expression instead of all variables to only read the required variables
* replace Jackson MessagePack object mapper by manual transformation using Zeebe's MessagePack reader/writer to reduce overhead
* allow multi-line expressions
* ignore Spotbugs for Scala classes
